mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.code, is_jz as isJz, longitude, latitude, redline_account as redlineAccount, point_desc as pointDesc, picture_url as pictureUrl , proof_person as proofPerson, a.proof_time as proofTime, b.real_name AS createUser, a.verify_person as verifyPerson, a.create_time as createTime FROM lm_marker_mobile a INNER JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE redline_id = #{redLineId}

SELECT a.id, a.`code`, a.landform, a.jz_kh jzKh, a.proof_lon, a.proof_lat, a.jz_number jzNumber, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.position_picture positionPicture, a.remark, a.create_time as createTime, b.real_name as createUserName, c.srld_number as redlineName, d.COM_NAME as placeName
FROM lm_marker_mobile a LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id LEFT JOIN data_redline_register c on c.srld_id = a.redline_id LEFT JOIN sys_company d on d.COM_CODE = a.code
WHERE a.type = 1 and a.del_flag = 1
and a.code like concat( #{code}, '%')
and (c.srld_name like concat( #{param}, '%') or a.jz_number like concat( #{param}, '%'))
order by create_time desc limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}

FROM lm_marker_mobile a LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id LEFT JOIN data_redline_register c on c.srld_id = a.redline_id LEFT JOIN sys_company d on d.COM_CODE = a.code
WHERE a.type = 1 and a.del_flag = 1

SELECT a.id, a.`code`, a.jz_kh jzKh, a.landform, a.object_id objectId, a.jz_number jzNumber, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.position_picture positionPicture, a.remark, a.create_time as createTime, b.real_name as createUserName, c.srld_number as redlineName, d.COM_NAME as placeName
FROM lm_marker_mobile a LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id LEFT JOIN data_redline_register c on c.srld_id = a.redline_id LEFT JOIN sys_company d on d.COM_CODE = a.code

SELECT a.id, a.`code`, a.jz_kh jzKh, a.landform, a.jz_number jzNumber, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.position_picture positionPicture, a.remark, a.create_time as createTime, b.real_name as createUserName, c.srld_number as redlineName, d.COM_NAME as placeName
FROM lm_marker_mobile a LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id LEFT JOIN data_redline_register c on c.srld_id = a.redline_id LEFT JOIN sys_company d on d.COM_CODE = a.code
WHERE a.type = 0

SELECT count(a.id) FROM lm_marker_mobile a LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id LEFT JOIN data_redline_register c on c.srld_id = a.redline_id
WHERE a.type = 0
and a.code like concat( '%',#{code}, '%')
and (c.srld_name=#{param} or a.jz_number like concat('%',#{param}, '%'))

SELECT a.id, a.is_bs as isBs, a.jz_kh as jzKh, a.file_url as fileUrl, a.word_url as word_url, a.jz_number as jzNumber, a.code, a.verify_person as verifyPerson, a.landform, a.proof_lon as proofLon, a.proof_lat as proofLat, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.remark, a.position_picture as positionPicture, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, b.real_name AS createUserName, c.username AS verifyPerson, d.COM_NAME as placeName
FROM lm_marker_mobile a LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.verify_person = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_company d on d.COM_CODE = a.code WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, jz_kh as jzKh, jz_number as jzNumber, a.code, landform, longitude, latitude, a.remark, a.create_user, a.position_picture as positionPicture, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, b.COM_NAME as placeName, d.real_name as createUserName
FROM lm_marker_mobile a
LEFT JOIN sys_company b on b.COM_CODE = a.code LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user d on d.user_id = a.create_user
where type = 1 and del_flag = 1 ORDER BY round( 6378.138 * 2 * asin( sqrt( pow( sin( ( latitude * pi() / 180 - #{latitude} * pi() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + cos(latitude * pi() / 180) * cos(#{latitude} * pi() / 180) * pow( sin( ( longitude * pi() / 180 - #{longitude} * pi() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id, a.`code`, a.jz_kh jzKh, a.landform, a.jz_number jzNumber, a.verify_person as verifyPerson, a.save_time as saveTime, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.position_picture positionPicture, a.remark, a.create_time as createTime, b.real_name as createUserName, c.srld_number as redlineName, d.COM_NAME as placeName
FROM lm_marker_mobile a LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id LEFT JOIN data_redline_register c on c.srld_id = a.redline_id LEFT JOIN sys_company d on d.COM_CODE = a.code WHERE a.type = 0 AND del_flag = 1
and a.code like concat('%', #{code}, '%')
and a.jz_number like concat('%', #{param}, '%')

SELECT a.id, a.`code`, a.landform, a.verify_person as verifyPerson, a.proof_lon as proofLon, a.proof_lat as proofLat, a.jz_kh jzKh, a.jz_number jzNumber, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.position_picture positionPicture, a.remark, a.create_time as createTime, b.real_name as createUserName, c.srld_number as redlineName, d.COM_NAME as placeName, a.save_time AS saveTime
FROM lm_marker_mobile a LEFT JOIN sys_mobile_user b ON a.create_user = b.user_id LEFT JOIN data_redline_register c on c.srld_id = a.redline_id LEFT JOIN sys_company d on d.COM_CODE = a.code WHERE a.type = 1 AND del_flag = 1
and a.code like concat('%' ,#{code}, '%')
and a.jz_number like concat('%' ,#{param}, '%')
